abstracts.abstract: Nominates Michael A. Strom as a Member of the Illinois Torture Inquiry and Relief Commission.

actions.description: Received by the Senate Sen. Laura M. Murphy
Placed on Calendar Order of Executive Appointments May 6, 2025
Pursuant to Senate Rule 10-1(c), move to compile the following AM's
